content.detailedDescription: Outside in my back yard playing in the sandbox, my search and rescue golden retriever started barking at whetstone mountain.  having seen a hang-glider land in the approperate spot just a few minutes earlier, we (myself, my 3 yr old jesse and the dog vixen) stared at the really bright light in the sky coming over the mountain.  at first, we thought it was  another hang glider but it seemed to be reflecting the sun so we couldn't see anything beyond the reflection of the sun.  no shape or size.  bottom line is that we saw it thinking that it was a hang glider but it disapeared into a cloud.  i watched the cloud for 11 minutes before i ran in to get the phone.  my dog was still watching when i came back out.  not sure what it was but we're all inside tonight.
content.summary: Usa  mountain time zone-  reflection off the sun

content.detailedDescription:
Roswell nm
2nd & eisenhower area
i look at the stars almost every night since moving to roswell about 5 years ago, but the stars are so much more beautiful outside of the city, in the cool weather i make a point to look.  what caught my attention was that there were no clouds, but no stars in a large part of the sky.  and it changed by the minute.  at its largest, i would estimate the object to be 1/6th of the entire sky that i could see, from overhead to the horizon. at its smallest, it took up less than 1/10th of the sky.

i had just moved into my house just outside of roswell, nm.  at about 10:30 i went outside just to sit for a few minutes before retiring.  i noticed an enormous blank object (blanked out stars as it passed overhead).  it almost looked like a stealth, but large - 3-4 football fields wide and longer than 3-4 football fields, 4 or 5 maybe, long.  there also appeared to be a small stealth riding beside it (between it and the mountains).  there was no sound.  not even on the ground - like a silent movie.  there were no lights, except on the small object, which had wing lights (one on each side) and a small red light in the center.

it approached the city limits from the northwest, and banked to its left, heading northnortwest over the edge of the city.  as it passed over the pecan orchards, it just faded away and the stars came back.  this thing moved very slowly.  the whole event took about 8-10 min. 

the outline was really all that could be seen as it moved in front of the stars.  in the front, it looked like a boomerang, more pointed in the front, which fanned out like fins in the back, but large and rounded, plump.  as it banked, it appeared to have an almost rectangle back, but very rounded. 

feelings and reactions:  i felt stunned, almost frozen. i didn't know what to think, even though i believe in ufo's and wanted to see one, but this was really close.  i thought about it for many days and finally called my husband to tell him.  he told me i was crazy, so i didn't say anything else.  my in-laws moved here from california.  one night they asked me if i ever saw anything, when i told them, they looked at each other without saying a word.  why can't this happen with someone else?  now that i've had about 6 months to think about it - i know what i saw and although i couldn't touch it or see it, it was there.  it would have been as if you took walmart and its lot, painted it black and flew it slowly from the mountains at about 200 feet off the ground, made a left and went back.
content.summary: Enormous object came from over western ridge toward city, as it approached, it banked to the left.

content.detailedDescription:
I was looking the sky when i saw a light 4 times venus light moving at human satelite rate out of atmosphere.
the light vanished not like a mirror reflecting sun but like an incandescent lamp being turned off.
the intensite of light decreased more or less 10 times and became like a human satelite reflecting sun.
content.summary: It was some kind of human satelite but expending very much light energy.

content.detailedDescription: About 9:30 in the evening, i saw two strange lights over lake jackson.  i was coming out of a building on us27, carrying some things to my truck.  when i first saw them i thought they were streetlights, similar to the ones that line the highway.  they were not moving.  i thought to myself how those streetlights must be in the distance, and on some tall poles, seriously.  i looked intently at these lights, and realized they were not streetlights, because they appeared to be high above the lake, and several hundred yards in distance from me.  after staring in wonder for a minute or so at these totally stationary lights, which were in close proximity to one other, one began to dim until it faded out.  the second light then did the same thing.  a few seconds later, the light re-appeared in a new location, a little further from me, and the second light then re-appeared close to the first.  i thought to run in and get my camera at that time.  i started to record these events, amazed as i watch this happen repeatedly for 30-40 minutes.  sometimes they would reappear in new locations unbelievably quickly, and other times several minutes would pass between appearances.  all the while, when these lights were visible, they did not move (there are reference points in the video that credit this).  i never saw more than two at any given time, but when a reappearance at a new location would follow a fade-out almost instantaneously, as it did a few times, it seemed impossible that there couldn't have been more.  the episode came to an end as i began to hear the thundering sounds of jets coming into the area.  there is an air force bombing range just to the north of sebring, but because this happened in the heart of the city and the lights were not very high in the sky, i find it hard to believe that this would have been a military exercise.  when i got home (i live right across this lake), i searched the skies for another hour or two, but saw no more lights.  the sounds of roaring jets was all i heard, which continued for a long time that night, even with the absence of these bizarre lights.
content.summary: Two seperate stationary lights that would fade out, seperately, reappear in new places, always one before the other, the other would follow the first, happened maybe ten times

content.detailedDescription: I was out side with twin brother and sis 20 years old sitting on the front steps..Nice sunny day few white fluffy clouds thenwe saw it hudge sliver circle ufo.And we all were stunned.Couldnt stop staring for 10 mins .Then it vanished.We looked at each other and all said at the same time.Dont tell anyone what we saw,,just couldnt belive it but the three of us saw it so clear,,trenton frankford i have seen sightings in the night,most of the time they were looking like a star really bright.But then starting moving around ,then just vanished.
content.summary: Suuny day white clouds clear sighting

content.detailedDescription: We are house sitting for my father in chino valley, az. at 7:48pm i went out and fed his dogs. at 7:50pm i noticed a light in the northwestern sky. i thought it was a star initially but it seemed to early. it was bright and then would get brighter on and off. it was just hovering. i called for my wife to come out to show it to her. as she was coming out of the house it started moving east into a cloud. we could still see it so it must of been in front of the cloud. after about 20 seconds it started heading upwards at a faster rate(pretty fast). it then moved west towards a large cloud. at this point it seemed to speed up some and it looked as if it was blinking but not like a plane. my wife thought it might appear to be blinking due to passsing through the cloud. it got really bright and just as it was about to leave the cloud it turned back towards the east and was gone. all in all in lasted about four minutes. i tried to take a picture but it was too dark and far away. my wife and i both noticed the neighbors horses were acting agitated and the dogs in the neighborhood were barking. our dogs seemed hyper(but that's not unusual). my dad's lab ran towards the northwest section of his yard and kept looking at us.
content.summary: Light hovering in northwestern sky. changed directions several times at different rates of speed

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the u.S. air force in 1971, serving at the 67th arrs, an air rescue squadron based at raf woodbridge in the u.K., and one of our primary missions was to provide launch abort recovery for apollo missions.  we had c-130 aircraft that had sophisicated (for the time) tracker systems that could locate the space craft both in space and on the water if they had to land downrange from the cape.

we would deploy from england to the ascension island which is about 500 miles below the equator in the middle of the atlantic.  we would go through extensive preparations, which included having a nasa engineer with us at woodbridge prior to our deployment.  he would monitor all the equipment calibrations and certify to nasa that all was ready.  when we landed at the acension, he would watch once again as we got the aircraft calibrated, before they took off to orbit during the launch period.

i was a radio maintenance guy, and was the one who worked on the tracking system, so the nasa guy and i spent long hours on the flight line as we waited for various things to be accomplished.  he had a mission plan in a black three ring binder, (which he gave to me and i still have) which described the various experiments to be done by the crew of the apollo 14 mission.  one was called gegenschein photography.  it had a very short and not helpful narrative, unlike the rest, which were described in great detail.  i asked the nasa guy what that one was about.  he said basically that the gegenschein line is a theoretical line of zero gravity that exists in space between two bodies, where their gravitational pull is equal.  he said that there were several around the earth, which were created by the various planets, moon, sun, etc., which created these areas which he called "stable points".  these areas accumulate space debris which generally doesn't move.  rocks and other debris would find their way there and lacking some force to cause them to leave, generally stayed there.  he also said that radar and telescopic examination of these stable points had indicated that in some, things seem to come and go.  he said the reason for the gegenschein photography was to take detailed photos of a stable point as the apollo mission went by it.

i asked him, if the ability to come and go from such a stable point didn't imply that the object was a powered craft.  he said that nasa believed that indeed there were powered craft using these stable points as "parking" places.  this allowed them to stay in a spot near the earth, without having to expend energy.

i eventually became an air force officer in space command, working in various sensor systems.  i had other experiences which tended to confirm my belief that the u.S. has much more information than has been admitted.

recently, i saw a show with buzz aldrin admitting that while on the apollo 11 mission, they had seen things they couldn't identify.  i really believe that on apollo 14, they were trying to get more evidence of these objects.

the official nasa website has got detailed summaries of the apollo missions.  you can go to the one for apollo 14, and the description of the gegenschein experiment is so brief as to be useless.  kind of odd to me, when compared to the descriptions of the others.

well, it has been a long time, but i wanted to let someone know.

thanks.
content.summary: Nasa admission of existence of ufo's

content.detailedDescription: "well, i was taking out the trash to our dumpster halloween night at 11:40 p.M.. on the way back to my aprtment building, i always look up at the starry sky when it is clear. i noticed that at first glance, that the stars seemed to be appearing on and off. then i realize that there was something in the sky, that was moving across it. at first glance, it was shaped well, like a dragon-like creature. i tried listening for a noise, but it did not make one. it moved so slowly, that i thought it might even be maybe one of those, creatures from virginia, like the 'mothman' or 'the jersey devil' of some kind. it also seemed to stop in mid flight, it's form appeared to be either triangular, chevron or a hang-glider shape. the only way that i could determine what shape it was, was by the stars, disappearing and reappearing again. it turned and heading over my building, i then ran around to the other side, and it had fled away. i left wondering...Was this a winged creature or a ufo. being just before midnight on halloween, i hoped that it was not a winged creature. i felt fear as i seen it, and maybe a little intrigued. as it left i became irritated, knowing it was going over my building, where my kids and hubby were sleeping. i would say it had to have been less than a mile away from me. i didn't have any recording device on me at the time. i do hope that this halloween will be 'strange object' free this time."
content.summary: "i wouldn't have known that it was even there, if i had not noticed the stars blacking out & reappearing again."

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on my couch one evening watching tv, my picture window was directly across from my couch, i could see this bright light, so i got up and moved my curtain away from the window to see what it was, it was simular to a very large bright street light hovering just over the wooded area at the end part of the field across the road from my home.  it hovered sort of back and forth, then disipeard behind the trees.  i have had about 3 or 4 other sightings basically the same, in the same place, in 1994,i believe (around the same time, there were reported sightings in the miramichi area, i remeber reading it in the local paper).  can't recall the exact time or date, just remember my children were small and already in bed for the night.  i do remeber one sighting, my niece was here with me, she was 16 and already in bed when i spotted this bright light, i ran down the hallway yelling for her to get up and see this strange light, however by the time we got back to the window the object had dissipeared.  one other time we were sitting on the couch again across from the window, my niece, her boyfriend and we witnessed the same light in the same spot. the first time i saw  this light i think i called my father who lived across the road from me (so this object would have been directly behind his home) but by the time he got to his window it was gone) he told me that it could have been marsh gasses.  i was somewhat freeked out, at that time i was afraid of the dark and the unknown.  so i was very nervious.  if i could see the same thing today, i would be more relaxed about it and take more time to examine and remember what i saw.  however i have not seen this event happen again since then so i expect that if it were marsh gasses i would have encountered it again at some point in the past 12 years.  so i do believe it was an ufo.
content.summary: Bright, somewhat like a extreemly large street light hovering over a wooded area neer my home in tabusintac.
Large shinny cigar shaped objected flew across sky into a cloud and did not exit

content.detailedDescription:
Hi 
my uncle ken lives on guler rd in trout lake washington. our family has been coming to trout lake since the marshall family settled there in the many years ago. we always camp in my uncles back yard during the trout lake fair and on friday/saturday nights we play guitar, sing, and stargaze. often we are up until 2:00 or later watching for shooting stars and we did so again this weekend. 

sunday morning 8/6/2006 at 2:30 am my wife jeannie and i were in ken's yard looking up at the milky way and facing east. the weather conditions were perfectly clear and great for watching shooting stars. out of the south appeared a triangle pattern of stars from behind the trees at the edge of the yard. this formation about was about eighty degrees up from the horizon and slowly began to cross our wide open view of the sky from south to north in the direction of mount adams.

we first thought this was our eyes playing tricks on us because the lights were the same intensity as most of the stars except they were all three moving north in a formation that moved without deviation of speed or shape. this was not a solid object but rather three points of light as we could see the other stars in the middle of the triangle as it moved. 

this was a large triangle, lead across the sky by two stars and the third one following at spacing slightly larger than the other two, but exactly equally spaced in relationship to the first points of light, then forming a triangle.

since there were several friend and family all camping in my uncles yard i began yelling for a friend buddy to get up, knowing he had just went to sleep in the back of his pickup truck next to us. he got up and came to where we were standing and we asked him what is that? do you see what we see? he said yes, those three stars are moving! 

at this point the formation was crossing the milky way but still bright enough to watch them. buddy watched them with us until they were blocked from our view by trees to the north. the entire time it took the three points of light to cross the sky took about two minutes. i have looked at the night sky for years and i have never seen anything like it. it left my wife and me with an uneasy feeling about how weird it was, and then we went to bed


gene a. presler
710 w. 24th st
vancouver, wa
360-696-1476
content.summary: Triangle pattern of white lights moving in formation across the night sky

content.detailedDescription: While flying from ft, laurderdale to atlanta ga. we saw a pulsating light which seemed to be on the ground. the lights were pulsating from red,red and a vert quick very bright white.  there seemed to be sparks coming from the object in a circular pattern 360 degrees around it.  the object seemed to be on the ground ahead of the plane. the plane seemed to be slowly passing the object.  as to the angle looking from the plane window  the object seemed to at be at angle of about eight o'clock.  my wife and i both watched it as the plane slowly passed it.  i think the plane was flying at about 26000 feet.  we continued to pass the object until it seemed to be a good distance behind us.  all of a sudden the object shot straight up in the air    and stopped. now the angle i am am looking out of the window to see it is about 11;00 0'clock.  i was flying four planes a month on a previous job from 1975 to 1978 and was able to feel a plane turn in the air, however just after the object shot into the air i looked foward to see if the plane was banking one way or the other.  the plane was flying straight and level.  i looked back at the object and it was still in the air above the plane.  it never moved one way or the other but it was still above the plane.  i watched for about another fifteen seconds and it shot back down onto the ground.  the movement time from being above the plane to being back on the ground was about one and a half seconds.  i continued to watch it until i could no longer see it.  the last i could see of the object it seemed to stay on the ground.  i intended to speak to the pilot about it when the plane landed, but when the plane landed in atlanta everybody stood up and blocked the aisles.  i really don't know what we saw, but it was a very strange sighting and i have never saw anything like it. i've discribed the event to the best of my ability.  this sightihg is as clear in my mind as if it happened yesterday.  thank you.  gene sanders
content.summary: Pulsating lights  changing colars

content.detailedDescription: It was a nice day at the local park.  the park is located on lake st. clair in michigan.  the sky was clear except for some clouds which were skatered in the sky.  as i was laying back on my chair i noticed the shadows of a triangular looking moving shape.  the shadows were flying in a trangular formation.  there were six individual smaller shadows flying in unison making a triangular formation.  at first i thought i was seeing things.  i was confused at first, because once the shadows left the clouds there was nothing there.  nothing there except blue sky.  the objects were moving in a very straight line in the sky so it was not difficult to track its direction.  every time the objects flew into the clouds i could clearly make the shapes out.  the formation was perfect! the other amazing point is the rate of a speed.  the objects were able to fly from one point in the sky (from south to the north) in very short time, perhaps 30 seconds.  no one noticed except me.  there were people everywhere, there was no sound from the objects and no trace of them in the open sky.  bizare!
content.summary: Flying objects in uniform formation

content.detailedDescription:
It was night and i was having trouble sleeping i got up and went downstairs to watch tv.  while watching tv something drew my attention to the northeast window at which i observed a large circular object hovering over a field.  it had stationary colored lights in a circle surrounding the very bright white light in the center.  upon viewing this i was perplexed i went back upstairs woke my husband and asked him to come have a look.  we discussed at some length what the heck the thing could be.  he said it might be some sort of plane, i asked him what kind of plane could stay in one spot for such a lenght of time.  we then observed a plane fly near and had an opportunity to compare light configuration and altitude differnce and other aspects.

this was no airplane.  after about an hour and a half my husband fell asleep.  i continued to observe this thing until around 4am. at which time i too fell asleep.  upon waking the object was gone. 

i remember having an odd sense of, not here to hurt you, dont be afraid etc.

prior to this experience i was very closed off to the notion of ufo's, i have considered the possibility of experimental aircraft and the like as well.  needless to say it has taken me two years to discuss this issue openly.  however, more people need to expose their experiences and then a common link might be established or at least there will be sufficient data to look at.
content.summary: Night observation, colored lights circling a bright white light very large

content.detailedDescription: Wife and myself living in trailer park, fairly dark skies, outside on porch around 11:30 pm. having a smoke and watching for satellites, we spotted two "stars" almost overhead just north of the constellation lyra, that were moving to the south. separated by about two finger widths, they moved in tandom one behind the other towards the constellation sagittarius. i think its sagittarius, but i know it better as the teapot. this siting was unique because we followed them for almost two minutes before they got out of sight, and right at the end, a bright "star" that i was using a reference point as to where i might lose sight of them at, suddenly flashed bright and disappeared. the appearant magnitudes of the two objects were the same as the two stars opposite of vega in the constellation lyra. in fact it was like watching these two stars move themself. we had commercial jets and small planes in the sky to judge altitude by. i am a former pilot myself and a former member of aavaso. what ever these were, they would have to be unimaginably huge, as they were high enough that we mistook them for stars for several second. they had the same coloration as stars.  the flash  occured in the sky as the pair passed a rather bright star, orange in color,as they neared my horizon sight. it suddenly flashed bright and then was not there. i was stunned as to what i saw for quite a while.
content.summary: Star following star across sky with third party flash occuring

content.detailedDescription: On family holiday at sani resort in northern greece. sighting occured at 9:30 pm facing south west on halidiki peninsula while observing a cresent moon over the mediteranean sea. 4 points of light were observed near the moon, initially believed to be stars (3 in trianglar formation surrounding 1 in center). 3 stars on periphery started rotating clockwise around center star. the three rotating stars then converged on the center star, merging with it as one point of light. the remaining star then moved slowly in a north westerly direction until it drifted out of view over a builing. the event lasted 35-45 seconds.
content.summary: Star like - white points of light of medium magnitude

content.detailedDescription:
I fell asleep on the recliner and woke at 5 am.  i had to get ready for work in about an hour, so i decided to lay on the bed for an hour.  i was fully awake, lying on my side with my eyes closed.  for no reason, i suddenly opened my eyes, and i saw the shadow of something on the window shade.

someone was looking at me from outside through the shade (shade is opaque), and then suddenly moved silently sideways, as if on wheels, away from the window. i saw this shadow for maybe 5 seconds. a few seconds later i heard the top of a metal trash can in the backyard open and then slam shut.

the image was of a very angular, skinny being.  it did not look quite human, and the shadow of the top of the head had to be at least 8 feet high from the ground.  i don't know if it was standing or floating.  i'm not sure what this thing was, but it had mass and cast a shadow.

and last week, when i was departing from my house, i caught something out of the corner of my eye for maybe a fraction of a second.  i thought i saw some sort of large ship or craft through the trees.  when i looked backed, it was gone.

i believe now that something is watching me. i don't know if it or they are just observing or intending to do something.  if they wanted to do me harm, they've already had plenty of chances.

i think the reason they are watching is because i recently became aware of the 911 fraud by the media and government, started going to mufon and granda forum events, and attended the alex jones 911 neocon event.  i had seen the weird "fog" and "trails" last year, and didn't know what they were.  i found out they were called chemtrails just in march, when i started learning about 911.
content.summary: Eight foot tall shadow of a being

content.detailedDescription:
At aproximately 10:30 pm, august 4th, 2006. i had gone outside to water a tomato plant. waited until that time as it was alot cooler. i was standing in my backyard facing south. the moon was to my far right. this sphere came very fast from the far right traveling from southwest to east. i also noticed a jet traveling from the north to south. the sphere was very bright white light, and the jet was alot smaller and had a small white light and a small red light, that were flashing. as the sphere was about in the 10 o'clock position, the jet suddenly turned and started to follow this object. a few seconds after the jet turned the sphere vanished as if someone had flipped a switch and turned it off. the jet proceded for a few more seconds and then turned back to the direction it was traveling. 
  i went to work, august 5th,2006, and was surprized to find out that a friend of mine had seen the very same thing, as he was traveling to work on the 4th. so, this can be corroborated by my co-worker. and perhaps other people in the area. as we work the 11 pm to 7 am shift we are able to watch the sky when other people are asleep. i was excited and frozen while i watch this event. it was awesome. i was so happy that someone else wittnessed this event. thanks for your time,
                                         katherine yates
content.summary: Bright sphere traveling very fast.

content.detailedDescription:
I was out on my deck stargazing. where i live, aircraft going overhead is occasional ��� i don���t live under a heavily trafficked air route.  the commercial airliners i see are almost always going east to west or west to east.  from my orientation on the deck, they���re always going left to right or right to left.

while stargazing, i picked up a single point of light moving across the sky from south to north. it���s size and luminosity was about the same as a bright star in the night sky. the big dipper rises up over my house every night and this was about the same as one of the stars in that
constellation.

it was traveling at about the same altitude and moving across the sky at about the same rate as a commercial airliner.  it traveled in a perfectly straight trajectory. since there was nothing else moving across the sky at that moment, my eyes were drawn to watching this point of light move across the sky.

after it had traversed about 30 degrees of sky, it winked out. just disappeared.  then, it reappeared about 10-15 degrees later, still on the same course.  winking out and reappearing got my attention but what really got my attention was that when it reappeared, it was momentarily much brighter than it had been before and then quickly resumed its former luminosity. while visible again, it traveled about the same distance as before then winked out again.  the same pattern repeated. it disappeared for 10-15 degrees worth of sky then reappeared, very bright at first and then back to its original luminosity.  it repeated this behavior about 3-4 times before it finally disappeared for good from my view.

the night sky was mostly clear with some thin scattered clouds here and there. i am also a private pilot and i am familiar with standard aircraft marking lights and anti collision strobe lights.  i did not see any of these, just a single point of light like a star.

i thought about:
1)  an airplane, whose crew for some reason turned all their lights on and off at regular intervals. i don���t know why they would do that.

2)  an airplane whose visibility to me on the ground was broken here and there by thin clouds. that seems to fit except it doesn���t explain why each time the light reappeared it was momentarily very bright.

3)  a fireball meteor. i���ve seen videos of them where then flare up, die down, flare up, die down, etc.  one of the reasons i like to stargaze is that i do get to see some shooting stars almost every night. i���ve even seen fiery meteors streak across the sky.  this didn���t look like it was on fire or burning up. it looked more like a light somebody was turning on and off.  also, it didn���t appear to ���fall���, but instead travel overhead and keep going.

4)  space junk? maybe, but doubtful for the same reasons as #3.

the flight path was straight and true. nothing odd about it���s movements. the only odd thing was that it would appear and disappear.
content.summary: Star like object that winked out and reappeared several times

content.detailedDescription:
At aproximately 10:30 pm, august 4th, 2006. i had gone outside to water a tomato plant. waited until that time as it was alot cooler. i was standing in my backyard facing south. the moon was to my far right. this sphere came very fast from the far right traveling from southwest to east. i also noticed a jet traveling from the north to south. the sphere was very bright white light, and the jet was alot smaller and had a small white light and a small red light, that were flashing. as the sphere was about in the 10 o'clock position, the jet suddenly turned and started to follow this object. a few seconds after the jet turned the sphere vanished as if someone had flipped a switch and turned it off. the jet proceded for a few more seconds and then turned back to the direction it was traveling. 
  i went to work, august 5th,2006, and was surprized to find out that a friend of mine had seen the very same thing, as he was traveling to work on the 4th. so, this can be corroborated by my co-worker. and perhaps other people in the area. as we work the 11 pm to 7 am shift we are able to watch the sky when other people are asleep. i was excited and frozen while i watch this event. it was awesome. i was so happy that someone else wittnessed this event. thanks for your time,
                                         katherine yates
content.summary: Bright sphere traveling very fast.

content.detailedDescription:
I am now reviewing photos of a trip i took in colorado one year ago, in august 2005.  of particular interest are frames 2, 3 and 4 (attachments).

i started the day in grand junction, colorado.  while in the vicinity of red mountain pass, on highway us550 i believe about half way between ouray and silverton, at (according the a map) about 11,000 feet in elevation or so, i got out of the vehicle to take some pictures of the beautiful mountain scenery.  i liked the green of the trees and the red of the mountain, and i just wanted to capture that.  i took the pictures generally in an easterly direction, looking at the west side of the mountain.  at this location, i took 3 pictures, frames 2, 3 and 4, seconds apart.  sky conditions were cloudy, with intermittent rain in the area.  i didn't "see anything" unusual at the time with the naked eye.  i took my pictures, it was all routine, and then continued on the way towards durango and ultimately to phoenix.  

later in august 2005, i noticed these abberations shortly after getting the pictures back from the developer.  i thought they were strange at the time, and told my family so.  my family (parents and sisters) also thought they were strange.  now i just think it's time to say something to someone.  i don't know why i waited.  so here goes.

in the first picture, frame 2, there is situated above the mountain a dark shape in the sky, sort of like a bent cigar or a hot dog.  there is no way it is an airplane.  or, it might be the leading edge of a circular object or disk, with something above the dark form, like a rounded cover or hump or something - but it is just too unclear to be sure.  it's hard to say what the size of the "object" is.

in the second picture, frame 3, taken moments later in the same vicinity toward the same mountain but to the right (south) of the original picture frame, there is a small bright light, fireball, orb, or egg of light.

in the third picture, frame 4, all is normal.  there is just a cloudy sky, nothing unusual.

i use a film camera, an old minolta srt101.  when i get film processed (wal-mart), i have a cd made as well so the images can be digitized and placed on my computer desktop.  in frames 2 and 3, i used a standard 58 mm lens that came with the camera.  for frame 4, i used a 130 mm telephoto lens.  it took maybe a minute to switch out lenses.  total time to take all three pictures was in the vicinity of 2 minutes.

what are these things?  are they just abberations in the image, mistakes made in the processing of the film or computer disk?  i don't know, but i think it's possible.  is it possible they are not abberations, but the images faithfully represent what was apparently in the sky that day?  i think it is possible.  if so, then something was in the sky that day that changed shape (cigar to orb/fireball) and then disappeared.  or, they are two separate unidentified objects.
content.summary: Possible daytime photographic evidence of unknown shapes in colorado sky

content.detailedDescription:
I had just left work in the los verdes condos where my work is and i was sitting at the light at military trail and i just glanced to the northwest of my location towards atlantic blvd and there they were three white discs moving very slow towards the west and were maybe a mile up in the sky away from my position.
the first one was ahead of the other 2 that were near each other and they were silent and moved in like a floating pattern (not a straght line) like up and down and a kinda wobble like free floating.
i could see them clear as day and i pointed up to the sky and the people behind me also got out and looked at them.
the sighting lasted about 2 mins and as soon as they got my 9:00 position they blended into the sky (just disappeared).
i have seen alot of strange objects in the night sky but this is my first daytime sighting and these were absolutly real!
i stopped to talk to some people down the street and they said they have been seeing strange objects at night over this area.
content.summary: Daytime sighting of three discs in delray beach, florida

content.detailedDescription:
Strange thing is that, this is a family story. i do recall the events clearly, which started this extraordinary set of events in motion.  those images are not something you forget.  i know it was tax season because we were returning from my uncles (he did taxes pretty well) and my father got his taxes done that evening.  we were on our way home, which takes us down county line road, then turn right, then half mile and turn right on to cr173.  we lived about a mile from the turn onto 173.  well as we were turning, my mother who was also a witness, noticed a bright white oval/almost cylindrical shaped object above what we called (for sake of this report we will call them the x woods) "x woods" (the x's owned the entire chunk of real estate).  within a matter of seconds, of us all looking to see what my mother had seen, i was thrown backwards with the great acceleration of the car.  when i got back to see what the speed was i remember clearly it was bouncing off the little bar at the end of the speedometer. the speedometer registered 120mph max.  it took us mere seconds, even with a 90 degree left turn into our driveway (driveway is about .5miles in length) this with 3 young kids, and an infant in the front.  we were rushed into the house, rushed into our bed cloths, and carted off to bed.  i remember hearing the shotgun being prepped and loaded, and remember for 3 days we didn���t go to school, nor were we permitted to play outdoors, and my father set with a loaded double barrel shotgun on the front porch for 3 nights. beings i was a kid i had no worries, i just did was i was told, and complained about not being able to go outside.  this object appeared 9 other times in my life.  i have seen this object up close; i bare scars, burns, illnesses, and other strange markings from events which to this day still occur with frightening regularity. i have been witness to other events outside my purview (happening as i just came in on it or happened to have been present during it).  the object i saw was brilliant, but not so that you couldn���t look at it.  it shined what looked like today���s laser pens at several locations, however the beam was much larger, and more intense. the beams did not shine directly at us however, but there were several noticeable points of contact.  a tree near our home had been singed, a barn roof had its roofing tar burned to a crisp, and our neighbors lost 2 of their horses due to breaking of a fence, which was also burned (horses later recovered 2 miles from their origin location), the x���s recall nothing of the event whatsoever. however their tree���s were also singed or burned and their driveway showed evidence of burning.  this was all quickly forgotten by the x���s and the like in the area as this was real rural farm country. from my bedroom window we could see the object thru the tree in the front yard for an additional 15-20 minutes.  this object appeared twice more over the next days.  each time progressively shorter in stay, the final night was its shortest stay, this time however it was in the field to the south of the woods, and appeared much lower to the ground, 20-30 feet above the empty field.  later descriptions by my father confirmed this.  he said it just sat there silent.  this time no lights came from the object like it had done the previous 2 nights.  he said it seemingly sat there, which was confirmed by my brother and i who were up way past our bedtime sneaking peaks out the front window.  the last night after hovering for only a few moments it shot straight up, it changed colors from white to orange, then to blue, and was gone. my father went to the site in the early morning of the 4th day, and found absolutely nothing.  no burn marks, singing, or anything out of the ordinary.  however he did notice the air seemed electrically charged and had the smell of ozone. this incident wouldn���t be so memorable had it not happened right in front of me.  to this date no other member of my family will discuss this matter.  my father and mother have now passed on, and the remaining witnesses to the event refuse to speak of it. if there were other witnesses to the event none to date have come forward.  i stand alone in this matter.  basically because it���s not something you talk about except around campfires and the like. i have asked my brother and sister who were in the backseat with me if they would care to comment.  their answers were outright no comment, so i will leave it at that. my postulations on what this object might have been go from a helicopter, military aircraft, to swamp gas, to ufo, to god knows what. i wouldn���t even bring it to your attention had these events not continued in my life.  i have contacted other ufo organizations, uforc and author bud hopkins in regards to the many events in my life.  to date only one, arc (alternate realities conference) in johnson city tennessee has any interest in this information. i wrote to them of my happenings over the entirety of my life. no one else has shown interest other then those i tell around the proverbial campfire, and even then those stories are soon forgotten.   i can only postulate that the reason my father hit the gas was that he had seen this object sometime before, and was afraid of it.  the shotgun and the porch sitting was another indicator that he was afraid of it.  my mother���s response was extremely similar.  they were afraid of whatever it was. i myself at that time had no opinion of it, not till it affected me later in life.

of note, the encounter was over a 3 day time frame.  night 1 it lasted 3 hrs, night 2 about 45 minutes and night 3 about 12 minutes. none of the neighbors remembers anything.  1 old fellow from a house a mile away was very sick after the incident, but had no known correlations to the event. other strange events surrounding this incident, was animal upset.  our dogs and farm animals seemed to be agitated for days after the incident.  the horses that had broken free of the fence exhibited signs on dehydration, even though green creek was less then ��� mile from their find point. they were also in a highly agitated state, and were not easily returned to their pasture. the object never appeared to move, just sat there silently with the exception of a location change on the 3rd night. i described above i was about 7 years old i really didn���t have any feelings other then the begrudging of my parents for not letting us go outside. i was more curious then anything. above i talk about how the object went from white to orange and then blue, it went straight up, and was gone faster then we could look up. other observations by my father are as follows to the best of my recollection.  he went to the scene of the day 3 hover, and found nothing except the sensation of electrical charge and the smell of something like ozone. he was at the area for over an hour, and saw no landing prints, evidence of burning, nor any evidence that anything had occurred.  no other witnesses besides my family saw this object, their accountings of it would be similar, and however they have chosen to remain anonymous about the encounter, only telling it as an internal family story. my mothers accounting of it takes on a new meaning of overprotection.  she later told me she had an overwhelming need to protect us, almost an instinctual need.  she described it in such a manner as to make me wonder if she thought this object was going to do us harm. my father���s reaction with the shotgun also leaned towards this conclusion. they were very nervous about the entire matter.  later incidents of the same type give me full conviction that they were right in their fear and precaution. this object has been seen in my life a total of 9 other times over my lifetime, each time doing pretty much the same thing it did the first time. i have also been witness to other events with different types of objects however i was not directly involved in any incidents with those. when asked my brother and sister remember the light above the woods but recall none of the rest.  however they too recall this same lighted object appearing at other intervals in their own lives. i have a somewhat photographic memory.  i tend to remember things more readily then other members of my family. i am the only one to have gone to college, served in the military, and done all the other things i���ve done.  my brother is a loner, and was often called the black sheep of the family. he is now living out west here, and started a family.  my sister still lives in ohio, and has started her own family. my brother (the infant in the front seat) lives also in ohio and is a family man himself.  my younger brother is the only one of us that does not recall the original event, nor has he ever had subsequent sightings of the event in his life. in 1998 i had a one on one with my mother about all the events in my life when i lived at home.  the horror stories she told me were absolutely beyond belief.  i remember them happening though, so know they are fact. in the 1985-89 years my father also told us of some stories about his childhood, and this object.  confirmed all my thoughts.  i hope this was helpful.
content.summary: The night the lights came

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend ben were driving home from the movies and when you get off the highway you are on a hill overlooking in between gates and chili. what made us first notice the lights was an active helicopter with a searchlight searching a neighborhood to the right of the horizon. behind the helicopter was a string of perhaps ten yellow lights that seemed to also be hovering. me and my friend assumed the lights to be helicopters and commented on the unusual amount of helicopters in the sky. once we reached lower land and began driving west we looked up in the sky to see the other "helicopters" and none were see in the area. the yellow lights were gone, but were definitely not flares. the yellow lights were illuminating the ground below that area very well, and the objects moved slowly, if at all. they appeared to be hovering and that's why we assumed to be helicopters. however helicopters could not leave the area as fast as we lost sight of the objects, and neither me nor my friend could explain what we saw. later on i became excited when i realized the item could have been a ufo, but remain skeptical as to the real nature of the objects(s.)
content.summary: Formation of 10-12 lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were smoking a cigarette on my balcony and noticed two pairs of lights in the sky. we initially thought they were two pair of balloons from their odd way of moving. the two lights in each pair kept a slight distance from each other but were moving in near circles, rotating on a common axis, then reversing direction when they completed a half circle and swinging back, then changing direction and repeating the movement again and again. picture a see-saw moving up and down with lights at each end. 

i live in hollywood and there's a lot of light pollution. these objects seemed very bright and relatively low to the ground when we first saw them.  i don't see the entire sky, my balcony is on an alley that might be 15 to twenty feet across and the building next door is slightly taller than mine.  we saw the objects very low over the roof and in the distance, we could see them clearly enough that we guessed they weren't more than a few blocks away.  at first we figured they were baloons that had been let off on highland ave., a nearby major street.  we thought maybe they were mylar and were reflecting illumination from nearby streetlights.

the two (four?) objects slowly moved north while ascending/getting smaller in our view and maintaining the short distance between them. after maybe two minutes we began to wonder how we could see balloons so well at night, and why two pairs of balloons were staying so close to each other as they went so high. there were police helicopters in the sky, and by about halfway through the sighting the objects were clearly higher than the copters.  

we kept wtaching and the objects began to fade from view.  neither of us owned a camera, we wished we'd taken pictures.  probably four or five minutes in, the pair of objects got too high and small for us to see.  my friend and i argued a little over who would write this.  he was reluctant, honestly concerned that he might want to run for office or have his family google his name and see this someday.  i decided to write this, sit on it for a few days, then edit it.  i completely forgot to send this to mufon, though this was my original intention.  i had posted a shorter version of this sighting on my blog, which was pretty much mocked by my friends.  the url is http://alexsfink.Livejournal.Com/?Skip=20 and the entry is just below the halfway point of the page.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A friend and i saw a two pair of glowing objects slowly rise over hollywood and drift north

content.detailedDescription:
My son and i were walking back home and and when we got around the corner of the house in which we left he said mommy what is that up there. i turned to look and i could not move. it was in the shape of a triangle and it had bright white lights and then slowly one by one they went off. my son and i just stood there and then we ran off to get our friend but when we got back it was over. all i can honestly say is it gave me the chills all over and the goosebumps. thant very rarely happens to me. probably about a month ago my negihbor and i saw an object that had orange-white lights and again we were in shock. both times were around the same time whcih was about 10pm/ they sky were i saw it was a grey color and then the sky went back to normal later on. look this is as accurate as i can remeber and again i must stress it made me feel very unease. i tried to stay outside but the bugs were bad and i must admit it freaked me out.I told my son it was fireworks and they were the quiet ones.

i am sorry i dont have any photos or proof but i know what i saw and that is why i wrote this.
content.summary: It was triangle shape with atleast 5 lights on each side lights were white and went off one by one slowly

content.detailedDescription:
I have been thinking about whether or not to report this last sighting.  when i read the report from 2006-08-02 in ohio, i read something similar to what i had seen only days before.  i am curious as to how close these people are to pa?...

anyway, i decided to stay the night at a friends house.  we were sitting outside for a couple of hours, just watching the stars.  i live in pittsburgh, and take any chance i can to get away from the city lights and look at the stars.  on this night, right around 2:15 am i noticed a very bright orange light to the south.  i watched at it approached (heading due north).  as it was approaching, it appeared to be a single orange, very bright light.  it was flashing on and off.  when it was off, nothing was visable.  no other marker lights, no outline of a craft, etc.  i got up out of my chair and walked out into the yard for a more clear view.  as the object got to be close to perpendicular to me, i noticed the single orange flash, was actually a series of approximately 5-6 very quick flashes.  at this point, the object was fairly close to me.  held at an arms length, a nickle would probably just cover the object up.  i noticed no noise coming from the vehicle.  and, even at this close range, the short time in the cycle where the orange lights were off on the craft, i still could not make out a shape, nor were there any marker lights.  just black.  as the craft continued on, i could see much more clearly the light set up and flashing pattern from the rear.  there were 5-6 round orange lights all lined up in a row.  three larger lights, on what i could only call the 'bottom' of the craft, as well as 2-3 more which swept up to the rear at appx. a 30* angle.  the rear up-swept lights appeared to get progressively smaller from the 'bottom' 3.  the flashing was a chasing motion, clockwise, from front to back.  after the last flash, there was about a 1/2 second pause where you could see nothing.  and then the first 'bottom' light would again fire.  

i watched this craft with amazement from virtually horizon to horizon.  i have no idea what it was.  my friend, witnessed the same thing, and had actually called me the week previous to tell me he had seen orange lights in the sky.  i was half asleep at the time.  his only reaction to the sighting was, "see, i told you.  you didn't believe me, did you?".

very strange indeed.  it sounds very much like the ohio report.  the only difference is what i saw continued this flashing pattern all of the way across the sky.

more people have to be seeing these things...
content.summary: 5 clockwise flashing orange lights similar to oh report on  	2006-08-02

content.detailedDescription:
2 sun long beach tower  apt distoted much closer able to move and change 
earth things such as house and satallites on top of tower apt on ocean blvd starange allien sitting in chair in other apt across from me things out of porpotion
content.summary: T2 suns long beach tower apt more close starang e allen in next siting in chair

content.detailedDescription:
As i was watching the tape i saw a point of light which at first i thought was a light from a house window, then two more lights came on and became very bright, then a object maybe two came in from the west and came right over the top of the lights below. both object became very bright and then the one on the bottom became dim and like a thin line, of light instead of the bright light. the top object was very bright and then the bottom ones went pretty much dim and you could see one of the the lights on the ground move up to the bright object which also started to get dim. but when the object on the ground came up, they both connect and became brighter again and then you could see a scound light go up. as this was happending the last light on the bottom was gone. after this it's hard to explain how the top object change from a very bright object to a thin cloud like and also toward the end you could hear one or two jets go overhead( i don't know how many), and when it was all back to normal you could hear another jet go overhead. it's very hard to explain except that both object were very bright and looked like half a dome? and could see the objects move up. there is a military station where the camcorder was pointed. i live in patterson in stanislaus county, and the name of the station is crows landing naval air station, only about 8-10 miles away, but it is also alot of farm land in the direction of the camcorder. looks awesome on tape this is a must see tape
that looks like it came from t.V., i had my camcorder set up in my back yard, i notice it when i reviwed the tape, at first i thought it was light comming from a window from a house, objects became very bright moved slow and hovered for quite awhile, nothing was quick so you could see everything very well. when i first saw the tape i was like wow, i can't belive i have this on tape and the best part i wasen't outside to mess with the camcorder and it was on a tri-pod and everything was steady. i tried to call any one i could on the internet to see if they were interrested but i couldn't find anyone to call, so i might call the modesto bee to see if they are interrested?
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: While watching the tape of the night of march 16,2006 , on tape i first saw a point of light at first i thought it was a house light from a window then thee was two more lights that all came into one big blob of light  and then a object came in -west

content.detailedDescription:
In early sept.,2003 a thunder shower developed in lebanon, oh, moving from west to east.  as the shower moved to the east and the sun appeared in the west a beautiful rainbow, spanning horizon to horizon appeared in the east.  i took my camra and attemped to capture the beauty of that rainbow.

when the photo was developed there was a ufo in the upper left corner of the picture.  the photo was stored and forgotten.

recently i remembered the picture and decided to do some computer enhancment on it.  i discovered there is an aura surrounding the object and it is leaving a streak in it's wake.  upon extreame magnifcation an opening or a light can be seen in the bottom of the object.

if you can explain the object in the photo, please inform me.

          thank you   jessie jackson
content.summary: Object appeared in a photo
